subtitle: hi I'm Simon Jacobson welcome to
meaningful Monday's where we answer your
personal questions the question for this
week is girls keep putting me in the
friend zone how can I meet a girl who
will take me seriously one of the more
difficult things is to look at oneself
because we're blinded and we're
subjective it's hard to see yourself
honestly that's why we need often an
objective friend a trusting one object a
mentor someone that cares about us that
does not have an agenda to answer this
question really requires a self analysis
of why would this be the case why would
people not take you seriously is it
something that you're projecting
something that maybe you're too much of
a pleaser a pushover so people just take
you for granted is it perhaps that you
have something your personality that
just doesn't let people feel they can
bond with you maybe you're pushing
people away even while you're drunk to
them there are many reasons this can be
the case people are drawn to people who
have something to offer that way you're
in their presence you feel comfortable
you feel secure you feel uplifted how
many people when they meet you do they
feel drained and how many people they
meet you do they feel empowered now very
few people are going to tell you they
feel drained by being around you but it
could be that one of the ways they tell
it to you by not wanting to develop the
relationship so it's important to
understand yourself in that way and
important to build up things that you
are confident in if you're good at
something people want to be around
someone that's good at something people
do not like to be around parasites or
people who are takers want to be around
people who have that type of positive or
around them you could elicit from within
yourself a deeper understanding of
yourself and your strengths and be at
peace with them and that itself will be
a reason for someone wanting to be a
friend you can't buy friends you can't
buy
a deeper loyalty that is just a
superficial type of connection or
friendship it comes through either being
earned or people appreciating you but if
you don't appreciate yourself how is
that someone else going to appreciate
you so it's time to look at yourself and
see what do you appreciate about
yourself and not necessarily put up a
shingle or try to advertise it but just
be yourself be comfortable in your own
skin that's usually a stronger stronger
reason for people to be around you want
to be around you and remain committed in
this relationship this may also require
not necessarily looking for hundreds of
friends maybe sometimes it's finding
that kindred spirit so on that you could
identify with someone you can have a
conversation with and not about being
pleasing them or trying to to masquerade
or try to perform that performances
being natural someone you can be natural
with thank you for watching I welcome
your personal questions please have a
meaningful week
